comment: She's funny, makes a class go by quickly enough, and you can easily fill out all of the lab paperwork in class and not have homework. Make sure you check for pre-and post lab quizzes for every week. Take her. She's pretty great.

I enjoyed Dr. C's class! I took her for Culture of Science and Math. Her class consisted of mainly conversations about life stories and scenarios, but I wasn't mad at it. Super caring and just wants you to do well. Would definitely recommend her

She is a nice lady, goes on and on about the most random things, very ADHD. Doesn't do a good job at explaining content, but is a easy grader. Typically lets us out of lab early. Just make sure you have good lab partners!

Very talkative porfessor but in a good way. Will say this, COME TO CLASS! Attendance matters as you will complete assignmnets in class for a grade. Also, be prepared to work in groups/with other people.

She means well and grades SO EASY just do the assignments and quizzes on time but..... the lab is 2.5hrs and TALKS for 50% of that time. So if you want a easy lab yess take her but just come w/ ur computer fully charged so you can play games.

I genuinely hate this professor. She talks about nothing for forever and gives you no time to actually do the stuff that needs to be done because she TALKS SO MUCH ABOUT NOTHING. She's totally unorganized too, i never know exactly what we're doing every time I come to class. Its not a hard class but she's INCREDIBLY frustrating. Do not take her.
she is very passionate and funny, she just doesnt explain the content well.

The GTA for this course was Josh Labus, and he is a great professor. He was extremely helpful and gave clear instructions and guidelines. You must attend every class and complete all the tedious tasks, such as reading through the lab worksheets before each class and taking your pre- and post-labs. I had so much fun and had a wonderful group.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: lovely professor loves conversations during lectures and tells a lot of side stories lol. HW isn't that hard and is based on reading. Exams are relatively easy case studies. Graded on one group debate, 3 exams (including final), case studies, and HW. Easiest class ever and super understanding!!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Group projects--Graded by few things
